goals__remit: Providing consultancy services for organizations’ activities towards the EU including policy monitoring and advocacy on an ad-hoc, on-demand basis as well as bespoke project proposal/bid writing, project management, support & advisory, regular monitoring/input into projects, policy developments, support to event/meeting organization and bookkeeping where required.
